formattedAddress: 123 Ludlow St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 123 Ludlow St, New York, NY 10002-3228, USA

originalText.text: Worst Pad Thai ever. Watery, undercooked instant pho noodles, no sauce, no salt, no flavor. Didn’t follow protein instructions. Insulting to be served this and embarrassing for the establishment to consider this edible and a proper representation of a national dish.

text.text: Worst Pad Thai ever. Watery, undercooked instant pho noodles, no sauce, no salt, no flavor. Didn’t follow protein instructions. Insulting to be served this and embarrassing for the establishment to consider this edible and a proper representation of a national dish.

originalText.text: I was super excited at the idea that I’d have a guy for Pad Thai. Little did I know - he isn’t the guy… Ordered the spicy pad thai with tofu. No spice. Not tofu. No flavor. Not the guy for my pad thai.

originalText.text: Bad food, worst pad Thai I’ve ever had. Doesn’t not state fresh and noodles were way too saucy

text.text: Bad food, worst pad Thai I’ve ever had. Doesn’t not state fresh and noodles were way too saucy

originalText.text: Ordered food to be picked up and it took about 45 minutes for that amount of time you would think everything is fresh but the noodles were falling apart and had been sitting way too long. The seafood pad Thai had four shrimp, five or six octopus, and was just terrible, it’s like eating oatmeal and the menu says you get six egg rolls, but there were only five in the box anyone who gives us play some positive review is definitely starving after a big crack binge because this place is terrible stay away

originalText.text: I ordered on Uber Eats and then looked at the reviews. Instantly regretted ordering and was dreading it arriving. It was perfectly good pad Thai. I’m not sure why there are so many 1 star reviews but I was satisfied
